summary: This is an email from an assistant attaching a PDF portfolio briefing book for an Attorney General's meeting scheduled for Thursday, June 25, 2020. The briefing book includes sections tabbed as 'Maxwell 1' and 'Maxwell 2', indicating the focus is on Ghislaine Maxwell.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The briefing book for the Attorney General's meeting includes sections specifically tabbed and named 'Maxwell 1' and 'Maxwell 2', indicating she is a primary topic of discussion.

events.title: Attorney General's Meeting
events.description: A meeting for which a briefing book was prepared, containing materials on Ghislaine Maxwell.

keyFacts: A briefing book was prepared for an Attorney General's meeting on or around June 25, 2020.
The briefing book contained dedicated sections labeled 'Maxwell 1' and 'Maxwell 2'.
The email attaching the briefing book was sent on June 23, 2020, indicating advanced preparation for high-level legal discussions concerning Ghislaine Maxwell.
